## The anticipated data sources

We plan to use [500 Cities: Local Data for Better Health, 2018 release](https://chronicdata.cdc.gov/500-Cities/500-Cities-Local-Data-for-Better-Health-2018-relea/6vp6-wxuq/data), especially focus on the measure "Mental health not good for >=14 days among adults aged >=18 Years"

## The planned analyses / visualizations / coding challenges

We plan to create a heatmap showing the geographic distribution of mental health problem in U.S.

 + Statistic models detecting the potential risk factors associated with mental health problem
